headline: Major streamers fight churn with limited-time offers as prices rise
summary: Streamers face quite a challenge in keeping their customer bases happy. They have to address subscriber fatigue, constantly expand their content offerings, and upgrade their services, all while competing with many other platforms. In November 2025, there was a higher churn rate for major ...

headline: Star Wars Gets New Leader for Franchise’s Next Era
summary: Kathleen Kennedy exits as Disney’s Lucasfilm refocuses on making movies. Veteran filmmaker and George Lucas protégé Dave Filoni has been named Lucasfilm’s president and chief creative officer.

raw.headline: Star Wars Gets New Leader for Franchise’s Next Era
raw.summary: Kathleen Kennedy exits as Disney’s Lucasfilm refocuses on making movies. Veteran filmmaker and George Lucas protégé Dave Filoni has been named Lucasfilm’s president and chief creative officer.

headline: NBCUniversal strategically leans into sports as it prepares for 'Legendary February'
summary: NBCUniversal's calling card used to be "Must See TV," but the modern media world has pushed the company in a new direction, led by live sports.

raw.headline: NBCUniversal strategically leans into sports as it prepares for 'Legendary February'

headline: Longleaf Partners Fund 2025 Contributors And Detractors
summary: While 2025 was an underwhelming year for the Fund, there was a clear theme that we can live with in the short term: we did not have enough big winners. Read more here.
